biography: Specialist in Valve surgery innovation at Cardiac Surgery.
aiSummary: S. N. Narasingan is a valve surgery innovation specialist with an H-index of 18 at Cardiac Surgery (Member). Has been published in Archives of Medical Science, BMJ Case Reports. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
